itunes:title: #16: Healing Codependency
title: #16: Healing Codependency
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, we dig into what is codependency, where does it come from, and what you can do to unlearn it. We also spend time talking about what it looks like when we encourage people to be codependent on us and next steps we can take with them as...
itunes:summary:
In this episode, we dig into what is codependency, where does it come from, and what you can do to unlearn it. We also spend time talking about what it looks like when we encourage people to be codependent on us and next steps we can take with them as well.

How to Stop Continually Finding and Dating the Wrong People: The 6 Step Method to Stop Attracting (and Obsessing About) Situationships to Get the Relationships You Want
